title: Blank Cordova Template (lite)
tooltip: Lite version of the 'Blank Cordova Template' template for creating an Intel XDK Cordova project.
description: Start a Cordova project with this blank template. One key file (init-dev.js) contains the initialization code needed to handle an Intel XDK device ready, a Cordova device ready or browser document ready init events in a way that allows you to run your app in any of those environments. See the README.md for details.
